    • Field Detail

      • PORT

        public static final int PORT
        The port that most of the network communications occur on
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BROADCAST_PORT

        public static final int BROADCAST_PORT
        The port used by the Client and Server to listen to broadcasts. This is used to that a server can find clients at an unknown ipAddress.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FRACTAL_FILEPATH

        public static final java.lang.String FRACTAL_FILEPATH
        The directory where all fractals are saved to
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CUSTOM_FRACTAL_FILEPATH

        public static final java.lang.String CUSTOM_FRACTAL_FILEPATH
        The directory where all custom layer types are stored as .java files. At the start of each instance, these layer types are compiled and turned into .class files. Alternatively, .class files can be provided and then there is no need to compile the layer type at startup. This drastically reduces loading times.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
